Everybody seems to be jumping with no hesitation on new movies while ignoring so many fantastic older movies.
Well, to be honest I'm fed up with new movies, especially those filled with explosions and shootings & non-sense- boring - -Hollywood-humor--dozens of cliches etc.

....and I keep saying that at least Nordic subs should be added by more uploaders (if available).

Thank you for sharing this great movie!
I have only question: I can't seem to fins the proper encoding of the subs, so to view them properly with VLC.
I am talking about Greek subs, and I've tried UTF-8, Greek (ISO-8859-7), Greek (Windows-1253). Each time I get characters that don't make sense.
English subs work great though.
Any ideas?
Thanks again for sharing this.

@babis200sx
Demux the sub, open it and save as ansi then close it. 
Open it again with notepad++ (right click on the sub)

http://notepad-plus-plus.org/
chose the greek windows, encode to utf then save.
You're done.
Thanks for this upload, didn't think I'll find hungarian dubbed version in 720p :PP I just have one question, is this that digitally remastered version?

@kdava 
No it isn't. This torrent has been uploaded on 2011-05-01 and its a good HDTV quality.The new restouration is now available on internet.
